1.content:
You're sitting on the front steps to your house. Summer has just begun and the air conditioning is broken. It's hot. Ridiculously hot. Even in just shorts and a tank top, it's almost unbearable.

Walking up to you from the sidewalk is your sister, Nikki. She's about your height, with her brunette hair tied back in a big pony tail. A few strands of hair fall down on either side of her cute freckled face. Much like yourself, she's just in shorts and a tank top as well. As her flip flops slap the path up toward you, you notice something in her hand.

"That's not your phone," you tease. She's always on her phone texting her friends.

Nicole smiles, "Be nice. This is something you'll want to see."

She points it at a lawn gnome next to the steps. At first you think she's an idiot. What is it going to do? Shoot out a sticky dart or something? Then, with a strange beam that quakes the air it passes through, she hits the gnome and it shrinks!

You leap up and stumble a bit over to your sisters side, "Did you just..."

"YUP! It's a size remote! I found it at an old warehouse downtown when I was skateboarding with my friends," Nikki explains.

After a moment of stunned silence you look at her, "Really? Then where's your board?"

Nikki reaches into the pocket of her shorts and takes out a VERY tiny skateboard. It looks like a toy! But clearly, it's hers. Customized with all the graphics she stuck to it over the years.

"Can I?" you ask, your voice quivering. You LOVE the idea of being shrunk. Or really just being small compared to someone else. Your sister knows that too.

With a wide grin Nicole passes you the remote, "What do you think I'm showing you for? I'd like to play with it too, but well, I guess this is a way you can finally experience that weird fantasy of yours."

Shooting her a glare you comment, "It's not weird."

"Then why don't you tell your girlfriend about it instead of me?" Nikki replies with a snide grin.

You're nervous, that's why. What if she doesn't like it and dumps you? More importantly though, you could really have some fun now. You could be a bug at her feet. Or make her tower over the entire city!
1.title: The Summer Begins

11.content:
Much like yourself, Lauren is probably at home. Thanking Nikki again and giving her a long, uncomfortable hug in this heat, you take off.

It isn't long before you travel across the neighborhood and get to Lauren's apartment. It's a smaller three story building that she lives in with her folks. To your surprise she's in the lobby.

"Oh! Hey, what are you doing here? Lauren asks, brushing back her chestnut brown hair. You've always loved that about her. Her hair is so long too. Thin, very straight, with a cute fluff of bangs. You stand there, smiling.

It takes a moment as your mind processes the million ideas racing through it. "Pardon?" you ask.

Your girlfriend bursts out laughing, "You must have come over here for something! What's that in your pocket? Got a TV remote in there or are you just happy to see me?"

The joke was cute, but you suddenly felt very self conscious. This was it. She'd pointed out the size remote. Sure, you could just brush it off as nothing. But it's why you came to see her.

Looking Lauren straight in the eyes, you swallow hard. "Can I... I can tell you anything, right?"

She takes on a serious expression. "Yeah of course. Everything is okay right?"

You realize you just awkwardly asked to talk to your girlfriend after she asked if you were turned on by her. "No no, it's nothing bad between us! It's... well, you know how we've never discussed what I like."

"You mean like, what you... 'like' like? Well yeah, because you think I can't take it," Lauren replied.

"Wait, who told you that?"

She smiles, "Your sister. We talk often."

"Did she..."

"No she didn't tell me. Go ahead, how crazy can it be?" Lauren urges on. At the same time one of the other tenants goes walking by. A guy in a red striped polo shirt and jean shorts. Had he heard anything?

111.content:
Unlike the slower shrinking process your sister showed you, a blast of blue light launches from the remote. It hits the guy checking his mailbox and he instantly dwindles down to a couple inches tall.

You're stunned, Lauren is stunned, and the other tenant is VERY stunned now that he's down at these two giants sandaled feet.

"What the hell did you just do!" your girlfriend exclaims.

"I got nervous. He heard too much," you try to explain.

She spins around and throws her arms up, "Heard WHAT? You haven't said anything!"

It didn't dawn on you but she was right. The guy really hadn't heard anything at all. Maybe that you had something that turns you on that you were nervous to tell your girlfriend, but that was it.

"Aren't those things illegal? I saw on the news this girl was using one at the park. She was arrested. You can't go around shrinking people!" Lauren scolded you. Then she notices, it's not the remote in your shorts anymore that's making you look excited.

You blush, but seeing the tiny man on the floor next to your girlfriends feet is too much. Just the idea of her moving her foot over top of him and stepping down is far too exciting.

"This?" she motions to the guy on the floor, "You're turned on by this?"

You nod slowly, "I didn't want to tell you this way. Ever since the stories have been showing up on the news I can't get it out of my head. I've always loved this stuff. Shrinking movies, comics, everything like this. But knowing it was real. That it was out there somewhere and I could end up shrunk. I couldn't believe it was true."

"But HE isn't you. Why would you do this?" Lauren asked. Finally calming down. At least she wasn't angry about you liking size change. Yet.

Looking in her eyes, trying to calm down, you explain.

1111.content:
"I think it would be hot to see you crush him," you stammer.

"W-what?" Lauren asks. Down below the tiny man starts to back away from her.

"Well I'd love to be tiny at your feet instead. But him getting stepped on would be awesome to see," it's stupid, this is stupid. Why would you say this! This can't end in any good way.

But instead of judging you, Lauren presses her body against yours. You look up from your embarrassed gaze toward the floor. She's grinning broadly.

"Barefoot or with my sandals on?" she asks.

Passion overwhelms you. Did your girlfriend just dive right into your fantasy?

She whispers in your ear, "I'll be honest. This is my fantasy too. I even hate this guy. He's always keeping us up all night. Loud music, screaming at his wife, he's a complete pain. I know, he looks like a perfect gentleman, but he's a jerk. I want to crush him for you honey."

You kiss her deeply and press her up against the mailboxes, pinning her hands to the wall. The tiny man on the floor is almost crushed under the shuffling of both of your feet. Was this really going on, he wondered.

"So? What should I do?" Lauren finally asks with a wicked grin.

1113.content:
“I want you to eat him.” You said. Lauren froze up, unsure of how to react. You took a deep breath and continued. “I want to see him enter your mouth and go down your throat. I want to place my hand on your sexy belly and feel him squirming.” You explained. Your girlfriend continued to be quiet. The tiny man at your feet stayed still, afraid of what was going to happen. After a minute of silence, you couldn’t take it anymore. “Oh forget it!” You yelled before running out.

You went back to your bedroom and collapsed on the bed. It felt like you really messed things up. Your girlfriend probably thought you were a creep and didn’t want to speak to you anymore. After about 10 minutes, you heard your door open.

“Hey Nicole. I did it, I told her.” You said. The person stayed quiet. “She rejected me though, I’m such an idiot.” You could hear the person approach you and sit on your bed. She started to rub your back a little. “You might as well shrink and crush me, at least I can make you happy…I guess.” The woman giggled.

“But if I crush you, we can’t have lunch together.” She said. You turned around to see the person was actually Lauren.

“Lauren, you’re here! But…” You started to say. She immediately put her finger to your lips.

“You were pretty rude you know, you didn’t give me time to respond. I know I was pretty weirded out at first but to be honest, I also have a pretty weird fantasy involving a tiny human as well so I can’t judge.”

Lauren suddenly reached into her pocket and pulled out the tiny man from before. He was tied up and squirming. Just the sight of him was enough to spark your interest.

“So does that mean…you’ll eat him?”

“Well I am pretty hungry, so yes, yes I will.” She said. “Then, I want you to help with my fantasy.” You could see the excitement in her eyes and smiled. You nodded causing her to kiss you.

“So, how shall I eat him? Will it be whole or chewed up? Shall I eat him plain or prepare him on a plate?” She asked. The tiny man’s struggles became panicked at her suggestions.

12.content:
Nikki sees how excited you are. You've really got along lately and she clearly wants you to have fun. "Oh okay, just run off and show your friends. I guess it's best to not make it too weird right off the bat. Lauren would probably eat you anyway."

You gulp, "Why would you say that?"

With a casual shrug your sister replies, "I don't know. She just seems the type. Don't give me that look I've been thinking about this stuff all morning."

Waving goodbye the your sister you head off to the mall. After all, if anyone is out today, they'll be there where it's sort of cooler.

Before long you're at the food court. The possibilities are swimming through your head. If your sister thought she had ideas, you had a novel. With your heart eagerly pounding you look around to see who is there.

121.content:
You walk up to two of your friends from school. They're a lesbian couple that you spend a lot of time with. Kimberly mostly, but sometimes her girlfriend Erin as well.

Kim is the taller of the two, with long blonde hair. She's a complete nerd and you have confided in her about your whole size change interest. Both of them know now, because she did tell her girlfriend as well. But they're both pretty cool with it.

On the other side, Erin is more quiet and reserved. You've spent some time with her, but never usually alone. Not like all the long walks you go for with Kim. She's a bit shorter and in a few ways reminds you looks wise of your sister. Her current pony tail doesn't help that comparison either. She doesn't have freckles through and wears thin, rectangular glasses.

Looking up, Kim immediately greets you, "Hey! We just heard from Nicole. I knew you'd come right over."

Blinking, you look at her in surprise.

Usually quiet, Erin speaks up, "You trust us. We get it. You want someone to talk to about all this so you came to us."

Sitting down with them, you pull out the device and show it to them.

"So that's it huh? Well we're just having lunch. Why don't you grab something and then we'll go have some fun with it!" Kimberly offers. Trusting them, you leave the device with Kim to look it over.

Of course you're more than excited to! Getting a burger and fries you sit back down. Only Kim is there at the table.

"Where's Gwen?" you ask.

"Oh she went to go freshen up a bit. It's cool in here but we just came from outside," Kim explains as she goes back to her own burger.

122.content:
Randal is sitting on a bench, looking around nervously. When he sees you he nods as you walk over. He's about your age, blonde hair, and wearing a tee shirt and torn shorts. He looks sort of like a punk rocker really.

"Hey man, what's up with you? Waiting on a date?" really you have no idea why he'd be this worked up.

Looking up at you, he opens his hands. Inside is diamond broach.

It takes a minute but you suddenly go wide eyed, "You stole that? Why?" He doesn't usually do things like this.

"Justice is supposed to meet me here. She said if I did it, she'd go out with me," Randal replies with a huge smile.

While that sounds amazing, Justice is the hottest girl you know, she's also a manipulative bitch. Could this be sincere or is she just trying to get your best friend in trouble? Still, she's incredible. Strawberry blonde hair, striking bright blue eyes, perfect curves, you name it. She's also wicked as anything.

"What's up with you?" Randal nods at you again.

It takes you a moment to find the words but you finally say, "Nikki found something cool. A size remote. Like the ones you hear about on the news. She gave it to me."

He looks stunned and slaps your shoulder, "Man! You must be on cloud nine! Have you told Lauren yet? Think she'll do some freaky stuff with you? 'Oh no Lauren, I'm shrunk and tiny! Nooo please don't step on me like a bug!'"

Your face turns bright red. Really, that situation sounds wild. Being tiny at the feet of your unaware girlfriend. Having her mistake you for a bug. All of it! As... dangerous as it is. Randal's impression, while spot on, isn't what you want him thinking, "No man. She doesn't even know about it yet."

"What? You still haven't told her about your little thing. So what, you want to be tiny. She probably wants some vampire guy to suck her blood while they get it on. Girls like that stuff man. Phht, at least any girl I've dated has. Go for it!" he edges you on, still looking around for Justice.

It dawns on you. If Justice is really showing up, you could be tiny at her feet. It's stupid, and completely reckless, but if you're going to do this, why not the hottest girl you know? You feel a bit guilty thinking of her over Lauren. But it's just a thought.

As you walked into the white marble room of the food court, you looked around for just anyone that you might happen to know. Glancing past the many fast food stalls, you looked over the tables like a falcon eying it's prey as you tried to determine who you'd first share your knowledge of size changing tech with. That's when you spotted the naturally black haired, now dyed with streaks of blue game shop employee that you had befriended over the years.

Gwen was a few years older than you, and had worked at GameShop ever since you were still in high school. She was pretty, in an alternative way as many people would put it, but you couldn't refute that she was beautiful no matter what. With a slightly long face, she had gauges in both ears, along with a ring nose piercing on the side of one of her nostrils, and even though she sometimes smelled like cigarettes you still loved her company, not that you would cheat on Lauren.

Approaching her, you saw her glance up momentarily from her phone as she nibbled a salad, soaked in ranch dressing. She smiled warmly as she greeted you, motioning for you to take a seat across from her. Not wanting to disappoint, you obey and sit down on the cold metal which presses against the back of your legs, exposed in the shorts as part of the metal touches against your bare upper arms from the tank top's doing.

"Hey! How are you?" She said with the same smile, having not eased it slightly since you got here.

"Pretty good, just trying to find someone I knew at the mall. Just my luck that you happened to be here." You said with a small grin, easing your feelings of anxiety about exposing Gwen to your device.

"Yup! Actually on break right now. Got about fifteen minutes left if you wanna chat about something." Gwen said as she started to shovel more lettuce into her mouth, chewing softly as she awaited you to reply.

"That's actually what I came to do, talk about something that Nikki gave me." You said as you pulled the remote out, shaking it slowly as to better display it.

Her face started to look a little confused, the same smile still there. "What's that? And who's Nikki?"

"Oh, Nikki's my sister. And this, is a shrink remote. Watch!" I said as I shrunk down her coke, watching as her smile turned to disappointment, but then amazement.

"Wait, so this thing can change sizes? Like everything?!" She said in astonishment, obviously confused at what seemed to be something out of a weird science fiction dream rather than real life. It took her a minute to even process it, but eventually she seemed to have settled down, never really being to out of her element in the first place.

"Would, you try it out with me first?" you stammer, looking awkwardly at your sister.

She raises an eyebrow. "You want me to do something with you that you fantasize about?"

You huff and your shoulders drop, "Look, is this any weirder than when I watch you squish ants?"

"First off, I don't let you do that. I like to step on them," Nikki began. Then she trailed off.

Grinning you try to hold back from laughing, "So what, you enjoy it? Are you sure you're not like me?"

"No! It's just fun. They're just stupid bugs. Jeez. So what then. Want me to shrink you? Oh no, here comes your big sister! I'm gunna squish you. Better run!" she teases, acting out chasing a tiny version of you on the ground.

"I could just make you grow. Then the whole city could be ants to you," you calmly reply.

"P-pardon? You think just because I was giant I'd start crushing the city?" Nicole answered. Yet, something in her eyes made you wonder. Maybe she would.

You shrug, "You could do anything you wanted!"

Her chest swells at that idea. You've never noticed before, but maybe she does think the whole size change thing is fun. Maybe not as much as you, but she isn't saying no.

"Well this isn't getting us anywhere," you say before turning the device on yourself. One click later and you're slowly dwindling down toward the ground.

Your sister gives you a perplexed smirk, but watches as you get smaller. It's something else, looking up at her go from staring into your eyes, to looking down at you. As you get smaller her ample chest even starts to cover up you being able to see her face. Before long you're down to her knees and feeling like a doll. It's incredible and your blood is racing! With her hands on her hips Nikki leans over, "Are you happy now?" subconsciously she wiggles her toes in her sandals and you can't help but watch.

"This is incredible! I can't believe I'm really shrunk!" you call up to her.

She shakes her head and booms, "I'm sorry I can't understand you at all. You're way too tiny. What's that? Step on me?"

With the grating of pebbles beneath her sandaled feet, Nikki moves one foot forward.

Your heart leapt at the idea, but she really wouldn't do that though. Would she?

You aim the remote at her, hit a bunch of buttons, and then slam the fire button.

The device sparks in your hand, making you drop it with a shock. Before it falls from your hands though, a globe of blue light shines out of it. Almost through every seam on the device. When your vision clears, you're both shrunk on the ground.

All around you the world looks enormous! Towering grass arcs over the pathway leading away from the house, which is absolutely massive in it's own accord. The sidewalk seems to be a mile away. You're not sure just how tiny you are, but it's definitely small.

"What the hell did you do!" your sister yells at you.

"I... don't know! It just shocked me and then bursted with light!"

The two of you look toward the device laying on the path. It looks bad. Is it broken? Either way, at your size there is no way you can get back to full height without help. At least it sure doesn't seem like it.

Nikki shoves you, "Now what are we going to do? If mom and dad get home, we could be crushed out here on the walkway!"

You gasp at that and your sister hits you hard.

"Don't you DARE! This isn't funny. I'm stuck like this too. I don't want to be small! That's your stupid thing. Help me think of something," she complains, pacing back and forth.
